sentences.en: Aromas of green bean, grass and lifted white currant intermingle with passion fruit and lime citrus.
sentences.cn: 散发出绿豆 、 青草和白葡萄干的混合芳香,伴有浓郁的果香和酸橙芬芳.

sentences.en: In the image, dust is red, hot gas is green and white is where gas and dust intermingle. Foreground and background stars appear scattered through the image.
sentences.cn: 在该图像中，尘埃为红色，热气体为绿色，气体与尘埃混合处为白色，前景和背景中的恒星遍布整个图像。

sentences.en: Intermingle CaO in electronic emission materials evaporation of BaO and increase the emitting current.
sentences.cn: 电子发射材料的组份和质量关系到钨阴极的寿命和支取的电流密度.

sentences.en: Just imagine all of the potential mother - in - law jokes and boss jokes that might otherwise intermingle.
sentences.cn: 可以简单的联想一下作为老板身份又同时是 岳母 身份的笑话也许会让夏安混淆不清.

sentences.en: Oil and water will not intermingle.
Salt and sugar intermingle with each other.
sentences.cn: 糖和盐相互混合在一起.

sentences.en: The pain and the anger were intermingled.
sentences.cn: 疼痛和愤怒交织在一起。

sentences.en: They intermingle with the crowd in the hope that their pursuer will lose sight of them.
sentences.cn: 他们混在人群中,想让追捕他们的人再也找不著.

sentences.en: Tumor cells at the margin may intermingle with cells of the surrounding gastric wall.
sentences.cn: 边缘的肿瘤细胞与周围的胃壁细胞互相混合.

sentences.en: Unctuous ripe red fruit aromas intermingle with hints of freshly ground coffee beans and mocha.
sentences.cn: 可塑性的成熟红水果的芳香混合了新鲜咖啡豆和摩卡咖啡的香味,令人陶醉.

sentences.en: Women have more sensitive smell receptors than men and prefer certain scents only when they're fresh, such as androstenol, which is emitted when sweat and oxygen intermingle [source: Fox].
sentences.cn: 女人的嗅觉器官要比男人敏锐得多。 她们对某些气味有偏好，尤其当这些气味是新鲜的时候，比如男性荷尔蒙，当汗水和氧气混合时就会散发这种气味。

trans.tran_en: to mix together, or mix something with something else（
